LUKE 17.24 swaswe raihtis lauhmoni lauhatjandei us þamma uf himina in þata uf himina skeiniþ, swa wairþiþ sunus mans in daga seinamma.
LUKE 17.25 aþþan faurþis skal manag gaþulan jah uskiusada fram þamma kunja.
LUKE 17.26 jah swaswe warþ in dagam Nauelis, swah wairþiþ jah in dagam sunaus mans.
LUKE 17.27 etun jah drugkun, liugaidedun jah liugaidos wesun, und þanei dag galaiþ Nauel in arka;
jah qam midjasweipains jah fraqistida allans.
LUKE 17.28 samaleiko jah swe warþ in dagam Lodis;
LUKE 17.29 iþ þammei daga usiddja Lod us Saudaumim, rignida swibla jah funin us himina jah fraqistida allaim.
LUKE 17.30 bi þamma wairþiþ þamma daga, ei sunus mans andhuljada.
LUKE 17.31 in jainamma daga, saei sijai ana hrota jah kasa is in razna, ni atsteigai dalaþ niman þo;
jah saei ana haiþjai, samaleiko ni gawandjai sik ibukana.
LUKE 17.33 saei sokeiþ saiwala seina ganasjan, fraqisteiþ izai, jah saei fraqisteiþ izai in meina, ganasjiþ þo.
LUKE 17.34 qiþa izwis þatei þizai naht twai wairþand ana ligra samin,
LUKE 17.37 jah andhafjandans qeþun du imma:
þarei leik, jaindre galisand sik arans.
LUKE 18.1 Qaþ-uþ-þan jah gajukon im du þammei sinteino skulun bidjan jah ni wairþan usgrudjans, LUKE 18.2 qiþands:
staua was sums in sumai baurg, guþ ni ogands jah mannan ni aistands.
LUKE 18.3 was-uþ-þan jah widuwo in þizai baurg jainai jah atiddja du imma qiþandei:
LUKE 18.4 jah ni wilda laggai ƕeilai.
Afar-uþ-þan þata qaþ in sis silbin:
jabai jah guþ ni og jah mannan ni aista, LUKE 18.5 iþ in þizei usþriutiþ mis so widuwo, fraweita þo, ibai und andi qimandei usagljai mis.
LUKE 18.7 iþ guþ niu gawrikai þans gawalidans seinans, þans wopjandans du sis dagam jah nahtam, jah usbeidands ist ana im?
LUKE 18.8 aþþan qiþa izwis þatei gawrikiþ ins sprauto.
iþ sweþauh sunus mans qimands bi-gitai-u galaubein ana airþai?
LUKE 18.9 qaþ þan du sumaim, þaiei silbans trauaidedun sis ei weseina garaihtai jah frakunnandans þaim anþaraim, þo gajukon:
LUKE 18.10 mans twai usiddjedun in alh bidjan,
LUKE 18.11 sa Fareisaius standands sis þo bad:
guþ, awiliudo þus, unte ni im swaswe þai anþarai mans, wilwans, inwindai, horos, aiþþau jah swaswe sa motareis.
LUKE 18.12 fasta twaim sinþam sabbataus jah afdailja taihundon dail allis þize gastalda.
LUKE 18.13 jah sa motareis fairraþro standands ni wilda nih augona seina ushafjan du himina, ak sloh in brusts seinos qiþands:
atiddja sa garaihtoza gataihans du garda seinamma þau raihtis jains;
unte saƕazuh saei hauheiþ sik silba, gahnaiwjada, iþ saei hnaiweiþ sik silba, ushauhjada.
LUKE 18.15 berun þan du imma barna, ei im attaitoki.
LUKE 18.16 iþ Iesus athaitands ins qaþ:
letiþ þo barna gaggan du mis jah ni warjiþ þo, unte þize swaleikaize ist þiudangardi gudis.
saei ni andnimiþ þiudangardja gudis swe barn, ni qimiþ in izai.
LUKE 18.18 jah frah ina sums reike qiþands:
laisari þiuþeiga, ƕa taujands libainais aiweinons arbja wairþau?
LUKE 18.19 qaþ þan du imma Iesus:
ni ainshun þiuþeigs niba ains guþ.
